penggunaan_teknologi: Technologies and Platforms We Work With

company.deskripsi: Fosan is an IT consulting and software development company that started from a Full Stack Developer Coding Bootcamp. Our focus on current industry developments shows that we can call flexibly and are ready to improve our skills to meet future project needs. Work transparency, timeline control, and consistently high service quality are our professionalism in providing solutions and helping clients achieve their business goals.

layanan.hero: IT Consulting and Software Development Services
layanan.deskripsi_hero: We help your business grow with modern, fast and responsive software.

alasan1.title: Modern Design
alasan1.deskripsi: Using the latest technology for elegant design.

alasan2.title: Security Guaranteed
alasan2.deskripsi: Customer data security is our top priority.

alasan3.title: Support 24/7
alasan3.deskripsi: Our team is ready to help anytime if there are any problems.

desk_job.title: Software consulting
desk_job.text: We combine deep multi-domain expertise, client-centric thinking, and an innovative approach to design and plan reliable solutions that perfectly match the needs and behaviors of their users.

desk_job.title: Custom software development
desk_job.text: We develop software with long-term business value - uniquely tailored to your business processes and tailored to future needs.

desk_job.title: Enterprise software development
desk_job.text: We build multi-faceted enterprise solutions that can easily withstand the highest loads, scale with your business growth, and flexibly accommodate functional expansions.

desk_job.title: Software product development
desk_job.text: We create robust SaaS, mobile, and desktop software products with great UX that drive fast-paced development.

desk_job.title: Cloud development
desk_job.text: We design and deliver scalable, portable, and secure cloud applications while helping migrate applications of any complexity from on-premises infrastructure to the cloud.

desk_job.title: Support and maintenance
desk_job.text: We ensure the smooth operation and relevance of your software through continuous performance monitoring, proactive optimization, rapid issue resolution, and the delivery of new features and integrations.

desk_job.title: Legacy software modernization
desk_job.text: We redesign and upgrade existing software to help you achieve modern solutions with optimal costs and minimal disruption to business workflows.

desk_job.title: Web Portals
desk_job.text: The web portals we create automatically collect data from enterprise systems and serve as an up-to-date information source and assistance platform for users.

desk_job.title: Websites
desk_job.text: We ensure our websites have an easy-to-use page editor for managing dynamic content.

desk_job.title: Web Apps
desk_job.text: We enhance business efficiency using scalable microservices architecture, enabling high automation in all business processes.

desk_job.title: E-commerce
desk_job.text: We implement intelligent automation to streamline workflows and integrate enterprise applications for seamless operations.

simpus.description: Health Center Management Information System developed by the Expert Team from FOSAN Using the latest technology to improve the effectiveness and efficiency of patient data management, drug stock, reports, and human resources (medical and non-medical personnel) in health centers. SIMPUS FOSAN has been integrated with other health platforms (PCare BPJS, ICare BPJS, Mobile JKN and SATU SEHAT Kemenkes) so that it facilitates data delivery and synchronization. This system has an attractive and easy-to-use appearance, so it can increase user comfort in applying SIMPUS FOSAN.

list.name: Real-time patient data can be updated and viewed directly by doctors and/or other medical personnel, so that treatment decisions are more timely.

Kunjungan khususnya homecare yang dilakukan oleh petugas kesehatan dapat dikirimkan datanya secara periodik dan kolektif sesuai format yang tersedia. Sehingga meningkatkan efisiensi pengiriman data ke server.
SIMPUS FOSAN mampu menghubungkan antar departemen yang dapat meningkatkan kolaborasi dan mempercepat pengambilan keputusan.
Pemanfaatan otomatisasi dan electronic medical record dalam SIMPUS FOSAN mampu meningkatkan produktivitas kerja antar tim menjadi optimal.

simrs.description: Hospital Management Information System (SIMRS) developed by the FOSAN team using the latest technology based on Enterprise Resources Planning (ERP) with the aim of managing activities in the hospital easily, effectively, accurately, and efficiently. FOSAN SIMRS has been integrated with BPJS Kesehatan (VClaim, Applicare, Mobile JKN, and ICare), INACBG's, and SATU SEHAT Kemenkes. So that it facilitates the management of BPJS patient referrals, facilitates the preparation of claim reports and cost groups quickly and accurately, and enables real-time data exchange, including patient medical record data, patient information between SIMRS and SATU SEHAT Platform.

list.name: Real-time patient data can be updated and viewed directly by doctors and/or other medical personnel, so that treatment decisions are more timely.
FOSAN SIMRS is able to connect between departments which can improve collaboration and speed up decision making.
Utilization of automation and electronic medical records in FOSAN SIMRS can increase productivity between teams to be optimal.
Utilizing back office features in SIMRS FOSAN efficiently will accelerate and produce optimal revenue reports.

BPSDM.description: It is a platform developed by the FOSAN Expert Team to facilitate online education and training organized by BPSDM. This system is developed with several superior features including monitoring dashboards, management of materials to be delivered, discussion forums, video conferences, management of questions and quizzes, management of training schedules, and monitoring of training participants. The clear and easy-to-use display allows the use of this online training system to be more flexible, interactive and efficient.

list.name: This training platform prioritizes user-friendliness. So that the interface used in this system can be used easily and comfortably by students and teachers.

This platform makes learning activities accessible anytime and anywhere. The delivery of materials is more innovative and varied, so that participants do not get bored and become more effective in terms of time and location.
This platform makes it easy for teachers to manage data and grades from every quiz and exam in the system.

Simadu.description: It is an academic information system platform for students of the Ministry of Health Polytechnic of Semarang that can manage activities related to lectures. The main features developed on this platform are the academic calendar, registration, re-registration, lecture activities, grade management, student grades, final project management, graduation, quality assurance, and room management. The features in SIMADU make it easier for users to manage and supervise lecture activities on campus. So it is easier to analyze policies and quality assurance for each study program or department.

list.name: This system is the result of collaboration with the management team of the Semarang Ministry of Health Polytechnic, so that the SIMADU display has been adjusted to the needs and abilities of users (both managers and students).
This system facilitates all real-time lecture activities, so that the flow of data exchange from each user becomes faster and more efficient.

This system is able to provide monitoring reports such as attendance levels, how often students access learning materials, to recaps of course assessment results, mid-term exams, final exams which can be used to evaluate the development of student abilities.

live_japan.description: It is a platform developed by the FOSAN Expert Team for digital English learning/courses. This system is developed with several superior features including online registration, online classes, discussion forums, video conferences, evaluations, lesson history, and order and payment systems. Live English Japan enables the English learning process, material management, student development evaluation and class payments in courses to become easier. So that online course activities become more flexible, interactive and efficient.

list.name: This learning platform prioritizes user-friendliness. So that the interface used in this system can be used easily and comfortably by students and teachers.

This platform makes learning activities accessible anytime and anywhere. The delivery of learning materials is more innovative and varied, so that students do not get bored and become more effective in terms of time and location.
This platform makes it easier for teachers or instructors to manage data and grades from every quiz and exam in the system.

MD_Clinic.description: It is a Warehouse Management System (WMS) platform to support and optimize warehouse operations ranging from storage, picking goods, to inventory management in medical device and drug companies for beauty clinics (MD Aesthetic Clinic). This system helps in automating various warehouse operational points. As well as facilitating the arrangement of goods locations, stock management, to order processing.

list.name: Reduce the time required to store and retrieve goods (medical devices and medicines for beauty clinics).
Minimize errors in stock recording and provide real-time data on inventory quantities and locations.
Improve warehouse space utilization by strategically arranging items based on frequency and usage patterns.
Providing faster and more accurate services, so that it can speed up the delivery time of goods to customers.

wms.description: It is a Warehouse Management System (WMS) to support and optimize warehouse operations ranging from storage, retrieval of goods, to inventory management of goods (special chemicals) in the Bahtera Adi Jaya company. The development of this system collaborates RFID and WMS which makes it easier for users to check materials coming in and out of the warehouse. So that the flow of material exchange in the warehouse becomes more accurate and efficient.

list.name: Reduces the time required to store and retrieve items.
Minimize errors in stock recording and provide real-time data on inventory quantities and locations.
Improve warehouse space utilization by strategically arranging items based on frequency and usage patterns.
Providing faster and more accurate services, so that it can speed up the delivery time of goods to customers.

STARA.description: It is a Human Resource Information System platform that can manage and automate various aspects of human data sources in a company, starting from employee data management, recruitment, performance management, salary management, reporting, and others. STARA consists of several superior features, including employee management, job vacancies, work accident reports, employee reports, and employee assessments. This system is not just a technological tool, but a strategy that provides many benefits to the company.

list.name: This system can automate administrative tasks such as payroll processing, leave management, and employee reporting. In addition, STARA reduces the risk of human errors such as incorrect payroll calculations and inaccurate leave tracking. Thus creating a more efficient, productive, and organized environment in human resource management.
This platform is a technology that can store more structured and accurate employee data. So that information about work history and performance evaluations can be accessed easily and up to date.

STARA enables companies to better plan, track, and measure employee quality improvements. So that employees feel more empowered and have a significant impact on the performance produced to increase company productivity.
STARA helps companies comply with employment laws and regulations by automating administrative processes that follow legal standards.

OSBOND.description: Osbond Gym is an application specifically designed for gym members, providing various features that make it easier to manage and utilize gym facilities.

list.name: Automate various membership management tasks, saving time and money.
Providing a more personalized and memorable experience.
Encourage members to use more services, such as classes and premium membership packages.
Members can make membership payment transactions directly via the application.
Provides updates on promotions, special events, and the latest news.
Monitor the activity of each member in the gym center.
Makes it easier to set up promotional schedules in each branch.
